posts.post_content:

Ty Cobb (Red) PSA 2:          Sold
Cy Young (Portrait) PSA 4:    $850 (no creases)
J. Evers (Portrait) PSA 2.5:   $225 (no creases, very undergraded)
Marquard (Pitch) PSA 4.5:     $180 (no creases)
Jennings (One Hand) PSA 4:  $130 (no creases, overprint back)
Jennings (Two Hands) PSA 3: $90 (2 very slight wrinkles)
Bender (No Trees) PSA 4:      Sold
Thebo (Southern Lg.) PSA 2:  Sold

See my other B/S/T listing for 20 other graded T206's I'm selling.

Ron R

I'll take Thebo. Email is on the way.

Cy
Bump to update sales, and show reduced prices.  All lowered!
